title: Chapter 19
content: Be not sad because all men Prefer a lying clamour before you: Sweetheart, be at peace again— Can they dishonour you? They are sadder than all tears; Their lives ascend as a continual sigh. Proudly answer to their tears: As they deny, deny.

book.title: Chamber Music
book.description: 简介： Strings in the earth and airMake music sweet;Strings by the river whereThe willows meet....
